title: shrI mInAkSi gauri
sahitya:
shrI mInAkSi gauri rAja shyAmaLE Ashrita rakSaNa dhurINatara 
laghu shyAmaLE sakaLE shrngAra kAmakalE shriyam dEhi mAm pAhi


caraNam   bhUmi jalAgnyanila gagana bhUta pancakAdhArE svAmini sOmasundarEsvara mOhitAkArE
kAmita phalapradAyaka kadamba vipinAgArE bhUmi pAlanuta guruguha pUjita muktAhArE
kOmaLatara padayugaLE guccha jaya stanayugaLE tAmarasa caraNayugaLE tatvam padArtha yugaLE
